summary: An inside look at the world of Hollywood special effects and the company paving the way, KNB Effects.

Romero|Tom Savini|Andy Schoneberg|Quentin Tarantino|Cerina Vincent|Josh C. Waller|Jesse Wente|Elijah Wood
title: Nightmare Factory
